en-US.name: Raspberry Pi 2
en-US.text: The Raspberry Pi 2 is a low cost, credit-card sized computer that plugs into a computer monitor or TV, and uses a standard keyboard and mouse. The Raspberry Pi 2 runs Windows 10 IoT Core.

en-US.name: MinnowBoard Max
en-US.text: MinnowBoard MAX is an open hardware embedded board with the Intel Atom E38XX series SOC at its core. MinnowBoard MAX supports Windows 10 IoT Core Insider Preview.

en-US.name: Galileo
en-US.text: Intel Galileo is the first in a line of Arduino-certified development boards based on Intel x86 architecture and is designed for the maker and education communities. Galileo supports only the previous versions of Windows, not Windows 10 IoT Core.

en-US.name: Windows Remote Arduino
en-US.text: Windows Remote Arduino is an open-source Windows Runtime Component library which allows Makers to control an Arduino through a Bluetooth or USB connection. It is intended for Windows Runtime developers who want to harness the power of Arduino hardware using the Windows Runtime languages. Developers who include this component in their projects will automatically have access to its features in any of the WinRT languages (C++/CX, C# and JavaScript).

en-US.name: Windows Virtual Shields for Arduino
en-US.text: Windows Virtual Shields for Arduino is an open-source library primarily for the Arduino UNO which communicates with an open-source Universal Windows application running on all Windows 10 devices, including Windows Lumia phones. The library exposes Lumia phones' sensors and capabilities to the an Arduino Wiring Sketch.

zh-CN.name: Raspberry Pi 2
zh-CN.text: Raspberry Pi 2 是一个低成本、信用卡大小的计算机，支持外接显示器或电视，及标准键盘和鼠标。Raspberry Pi 2支持运行Windows 10 IoT Core。

zh-CN.name: MinnowBoard Max
zh-CN.text: MinnowBoard Max 是一个硬件开放的嵌入式主板，采用英特尔凌动E38XX系列SOC核心。 MinnowBoard Max支持运行Windows 10 IoT Core Insider Preview。

zh-CN.name: Galileo
zh-CN.text: Intel Galileo 是基于Intel x86架构并且兼容Arduino的开发板，主要为创客和教育社区设计。伽利略只支持上一代Windows，不支持Windows 10 IoT Core。

zh-CN.name: Windows Remote Arduino
zh-CN.text: Windows Remote Arduino 是一个开源的Windows Runtime组件库，使创客能够通过蓝牙或USB连接来控制Arduino设备。其目的是使开发者能够方便的使用Windows Runtime编写程序来发挥Arduino相关硬件的力量。开发者只需在项目中引用这个组件库，就可以应用其功能于任何WinRT语言中（C++/ CX，C#和JavaScript）。

zh-CN.name: Windows Virtual Shields for Arduino
zh-CN.text: Windows Virtual Shields for Arduino是一个开源库，其目的是让Arduino UNO与一个开源的Universal Windows app进行通信，这个app可以运行在所有的Windows 10设备上，包括Windows Lumia手机。该库能够将Lumia手机的各种传感器和功能暴漏给Arduino Wiring Sketch使用。
